attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
as marriage is a free gift from god, & open to belivers/nonbelivers alike. I feel that the gift of marriage should be free to all. and the formation of a marriage should be a private matter between a man &  a woman, which is free from church/state control. as it was before the hardwicke act of 1753.

please will the goverment recognize our rights under the human rights act to form a marriage.
